body_html:
@ghostplant God, thank you so much! Got another problem now though for one of my programs.

while_loop() got an unexpected keyword argument 'maximum_iterations'

This mentioned while_loop() is on line 2957 of the same backend.py file, and the code I have written is working on other systems with different versions of tensorflow. If you have some time could you please look at it? (I'm using LSTM to generate text and it needs to access the RNN part of the backend code, can't figure out why)

Thanks again!

body:
@ghostplant God, thank you so much! Got another problem now though for one of my programs.

while_loop() got an unexpected keyword argument 'maximum_iterations'

This mentioned while_loop() is on line 2957 of the same backend.py file, and the code I have written is working on other systems with different versions of tensorflow. If you have some time could you please look at it? (I'm using LSTM to generate text and it needs to access the RNN part of the backend code, can't figure out why)

Thanks again!
